name: For the Revolution - smithy simulator
description:
For the Revolution - smithy simulator, is a gamejam game where you take the role of a local smithy in time of a civil revolution. Smith items for the locals, and see if you have the skill to make a legendary blade

I actually used this game jam as a test to see if i could make a passable user interface from component parts. all ui elements are made from a single 55x74 png (UI.png in the files)
